name: Best Game Ever [Low Effort Winter Jam 2019]
name_original: Best Game Ever [Low Effort Winter Jam 2019]
description:
Made for Low Effort Winter Jam 2019. Optional theme: Main/Start Menu.


!! For some reason Chrome doesn't allow to drag objects with mouse, but it's still possible to finish affected minigames. However, if you want everything to work correctly, either use other web browser (can confirm it's ok in Firefox) or download the desktop version. !!

For the 'low effort jam' me and my friends actually did put a lot of effort into making a game and now we can proudly present you... Best Game Ever!

Main features:

  • Interesting story with a lot of unexpected plot twists!
  • Countless hours of excellent gameplay!
  • Highest quality graphics and audio effects!
  • No microtransactions, no lootboxes, no real game no battle royale mode!

But not every one of you will have a chance of experiencing this glorious adventure. First you'll need to go through series of brutal tests, that will make use of your every skill and eventually prove if you're worthy playing... Best Game Ever!

We wish you best of luck and a lot of fun!

Enjoy!
***

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • GIMP 2.something
  • Visual Studio 2017

Made by:

  • Me (obviously), Emki
  • Matsoj
  • One other person, that doesn't want to be credited (which is totally understandable)
Oh, and remember to check the system requierments shown on the game's box first, they're pretty high.
